CustomField.formula: CASE( MOD(Date_LOA_accepted_by_provider__c - DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, (Date_LOA_accepted_by_provider__c) + Maximum_SLA__c + FLOOR((Maximum_SLA__c-1)/5)*2, 1, (Date_LOA_accepted_by_provider__c) + Maximum_SLA__c + FLOOR((Maximum_SLA__c)/5)*2, 2, (Date_LOA_accepted_by_provider__c) + Maximum_SLA__c + FLOOR((Maximum_SLA__c+1)/5)*2, 3, (Date_LOA_accepted_by_provider__c) + Maximum_SLA__c + FLOOR((Maximum_SLA__c+2)/5)*2, 4, (Date_LOA_accepted_by_provider__c) + Maximum_SLA__c + FLOOR((Maximum_SLA__c+3)/5)*2, 5, (Date_LOA_accepted_by_provider__c) + Maximum_SLA__c + CEILING((Maximum_SLA__c)/5)*2, 6, (Date_LOA_accepted_by_provider__c) - IF(Maximum_SLA__c>0,1,0) + Maximum_SLA__c + CEILING((Maximum_SLA__c)/5)*2, null)
CustomField.label: Expected Response Date
